android_package_name.description: Android package name for OAuth return-to-app. Must be pre-registered for the account and allowlisted in Plaid Dashboard. Required for Android OAuth flows. Cannot be used with redirect_uri.

owner.description: Beneficiary name for wire transfers (maps from POST request owner field)
